actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically {@condition petrified}. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.
